name: Time Tactics
description:
Description

Loop time to reduce enemies to zero in as few loops as possible.

Controls

W / S - Move

A / D - Turn

Space - Shoot

Assets

Ship and enemy sprites by:

avodhel: https://opengameart.org/content/simple-space-pack

Sound effects by:

qudodop - https://opengameart.org/content/wind-hit-time-morph

dklon - https://opengameart.org/content/laser-fire, https://opengameart.org/content/dings

Music by:

Ville Nousiainen (http://soundcloud.com/mutkanto) - https://opengameart.org/content/fast-fight-battle-music

background image was generated using Midjourney
